description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Message Queuing information disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-38017), it is essential to apply the relevant update packages based on your system version:

1. Identify your Windows version:
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: Apply KB5040442
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2: Apply KB5040442
   - Windows 11 Version 21H2: Apply KB5040431
   - Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: Apply KB5040448
   - Windows 10 for 32-bit Systems: Apply KB5040448
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems: Apply KB5040427
   - Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems: Apply KB5040427

2. Download the updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog links:
   - [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
   - [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)
   - [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
   - [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)

3. Install the updates following your organization's patch management policies.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is compatible with the specified Windows version and build before applying updates.
- Backup critical data prior to installation to prevent data loss.

**Details**:
This update addresses the exposure of sensitive information to unauthorized actors, a significant security risk. Users should prioritize installation to mitigate further impacts. Failure to update may leave systems vulnerable to information disclosure issues.
